titles.title: To ensure the efficient allocation of telephone numbers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Telecommunications and the Internet.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 1/7/2003--Introduced. Directs the Federal Communications Commission: (1) to develop and implement a plan for the efficient allocation of telephone numbers; and (2) until it has fully implemented such plan and at the request of a State commission, to delegate its jurisdiction over telephone numbering to permit the State commission to implement measures to conserve telephone numbers.
